learning_outcomes.description: Discuss Australian vertebrate morphology and diversity in an evolutionary context
Identify and taxonomically place a range of vertebrate animals
Present morphological and anatomical observations in written and drawn form
Understand the unique features of the Australian vertebrate fauna

assessments.due_date: Essay is due on Wed 28 August at 14:00h.
assessments.task_description: This is an essay which the students will prepare throughout the first 5 weeks of the semester. Students will be able to choose a group of vertebrates on which they will present a written report in conjunction with a poster (see poster assessment item). Essay is due on Wed 28 August at 14:00h.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.due_date: Poster is due on Wed 11 September at 14:00h.
assessments.task_description: This poster will summarize the essay on evolution and diversity of the student's group of choice.
assessments.submission_guidelines: Submitted BOTH as a electronic copy through Turnitin and a hard copy: A2 size poster. For the hard copy, a coversheet will be sent to you 1 week before the submission date. Please print, sign and attach it to your poster before submitting it to the SENV Help Desk - Steele Building.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.due_date: Students will be notified of Practical Exam date later in semester
assessments.task_description: This exam covers all practical content of the course
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to defer this exam.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to defer this exam.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to defer this exam.

assessments.assessment_title: Diversity, evolution, comparative anatomy/function - final exam
assessments.task_description: This exam covers the entire lecture content of the course.
assessments.submission_guidelines: You may be able to defer this exam.

assessments.additional_info: You may be able to defer this exam.
